languages.text: "Я счастлив{mf||а} иметь в команде служительницу Золотого Трона. Пусть враги Империума вздрогнут под нашим совместным натиском!"
"It pleases me to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"
languages.original_text: "Я счастлив{mf||а} иметь в команде служительницу Золотого Трона. Пусть враги Империума вздрогнут под нашим совместным натиском!"

traits.locale_text: "I'm happy to have a servant of the Golden Throne on my crew. Let the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"
"I'm happy to have a servant of the Golden Throne on my crew. Let the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"
"I'm happy to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"
"I'm happy to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"
"It pleases me to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"

languages.text: “我的船员之中有一位黄金王座的仆人，这让我很高兴。愿帝国的敌人在我们的攻势面前溃不成军！”
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"

traits.locale_text: “我的船员之中有一位黄金王座的仆人，这让我很高兴。愿帝国的敌人在我们的攻势面前溃不成军！”

languages.text: «Me alegro de tener a una sierva del Trono Dorado en la tripulación. ¡Que los enemigos del Imperium tiemblen ante nuestra acometida!».
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de tener a una sierva del Trono Dorado en la tripulación. ¡Que los enemigos del Imperium tiemblen ante nuestra acometida!».

languages.text: 「黄金の玉座に仕える者が乗組員として存在するのは喜ばしいことだ。帝国の敵が、我らが猛攻を前に震え上がらんことを！」
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"

traits.locale_text: 「黄金の玉座に仕える者が乗組員として存在するのは喜ばしいことだ。帝国の敵が、我らが猛攻を前に震え上がらんことを！」

languages.text: "Es freut mich, eine Dienerin des Goldenen Throns in meiner Crew zu haben. Mögen die Feinde des Imperiums vor unserer geballten Macht erzittern!"
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"

traits.locale_text: "Es freut mich, eine Dienerin des Goldenen Throns in meiner Crew zu haben. Mögen die Feinde des Imperiums vor unserer geballten Macht erzittern!"

languages.text: « Je me félicite de compter une servante du Trône d'Or au sein de mon équipage. Puissent les ennemis de l'Imperium trembler devant notre fougue ! »
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"

traits.locale_text: « Je me félicite de compter une servante du Trône d'Or au sein de mon équipage. Puissent les ennemis de l'Imperium trembler devant notre fougue ! »

languages.text: "Mürettebatımda Altın Taht'ın bir hizmetkârını görmek beni memnun ediyor. İmparatorluk düşmanları önümüzde tir tir titresin!"
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to have a servant of the Golden Throne in my crew. May the enemies of the Imperium tremble before our onslaught!"

traits.locale_text: "Mürettebatımda Altın Taht'ın bir hizmetkârını görmek beni memnun ediyor. İmparatorluk düşmanları önümüzde tir tir titresin!"
